Bill Slater at Edit Alchemy has been a valued and integral business partner for over 15 years. We've worked on more than fifty video programs featuring organizations that range from Fortune 500 to small business operations. With each program, Bill brought his incredible creative talent and editing skill to produce segments that have won numerous Telly Awards and garnered the praise of my clients and their customers alike. His equipment and software is state-of-the-art, and he's regularly testing out the latest industry products for fit with his clients. I've found it refreshing to be able to trust Bill to take my project vision and quickly turn it into reality, on time and well within budget. When my next project deal is signed, Bill and Edit Alchemy will be getting the assignment! Beverly Amer President and Executive Producer, Aspenleaf Productions, Inc. Flagstaff, AZ
